message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you.  What would you say to an investment of $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. What do you think?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet halfway at $13,000?
